program combined

implicit none

integer :: n, i, j, k, max_val, current_count, A, B, result
integer, allocatable :: arr(:), temp_arr(:)
character(len=1) :: B_str

! Read input for first program
read*, n
allocate(arr(n))
read*, arr

! Compute first program's output (A)
if (n ==1) then
    if (arr(1) ==1) then
        A =0
    else
        A =1
    end if
else
    max_val = -huge(max_val)
    do i=1, n
        do j=i, n
            temp_arr = arr
            do k =i, j
                if (temp_arr(k) ==0) then
                    temp_arr(k) =1
                else
                    temp_arr(k) =0
                end if
            end do
            current_count = count(temp_arr ==1)
            if (current_count > max_val) then
                max_val = current_count
            end if
        end do
    end do
    A = max_val
end if

! Second program's logic
if (A ==1) then
    B =0
else
    B =1
end if

! Convert B to character string
B_str = char(B + ichar('0'))

! Process third program's logic
integer :: len = len_trim(B_str)
integer, allocatable :: digits(:)
integer :: bills =0, i_digit

allocate(digits(len +1))
digits =0

! Fill digits array with reversed digits of B_str
do i=1, len
    digits(i) = ichar(B_str(i:i)) - ichar('0')
end do

! Process each digit
do i=1, len+1
    ! Handle carry if digit is 10
    if (digits(i) ==10) then
        digits(i+1) = digits(i+1) +1
        digits(i) =0
    end if

    ! Calculate contribution to bills
    if (digits(i) <5) then
        bills = bills + digits(i)
    else if (digits(i) ==5) then
        if (i < len+1) then
            if (digits(i+1) >=5) then
                digits(i+1) = digits(i+1) +1
            end if
        end if
        bills = bills +5
    else
        bills = bills + (10 - digits(i))
        if (i < len+1) then
            digits(i+1) = digits(i+1) +1
        end if
    end if
end do

! Output the result
print*, bills

deallocate(arr, digits)

end program combined
